Header.title: PiratesCatcher
Header.paragraph: You catch it, we snatch it

About.paragraph: PiratesCatcher is a platform where filmmakers can keep a track of all the events starting from movie registration,shooting,editing final copy and then distribution of copies.It also uses digital watermarking and encryption technologies to detect pirated copy and also the pirate.
